title: Value Investing Club
subtitle: INVEST WITH CLARITY. LEARN WITH PEERS.
description: After two successful years, the Value Investing Club continues to grow. We focus on structured networking and deep-dive knowledge sessions to help members master the art of value investing.

title: Tech & AI Study Group
subtitle: ENHANCING PROFESSIONAL PRODUCTIVITY
description: Technology and AI are now part of daily professional work. This study group helps members use tech tools to save time, improve accuracy, and deliver better outcomes. Sessions are practical and use-case driven.
features: Practical use of AI & Tech tools

title: Student B.U.D.D.Y. (MITRAM)
subtitle: CAPITAL MARKET COMMITTEE OF CVOCA
description: A structured mentoring initiative for CA, CS, and CMA students. We focus on guidance, motivation, and hand-holding from the 'Dream till Degree'. We provide academic and emotional support during the course.

title: Student Education & Laptop Loan
subtitle: THROUGH CVOCA SUPPORT NETWORK
description: A financial assistance initiative to support CA, CS, and CMA students. We aim to reduce the financial burden on students and enable access to laptops and study resources for uninterrupted professional education.
